titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - as to defendant Leonardo Castro. John Berry, Jr. is appointed as stand-by counsel for the above-named defendant. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Leonardo Castro as ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (SED)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Leonardo Castro as ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (SED)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 29 Motion to Continue as to Leonardo Castro (1). Defendant's unopposed motion to continue, (filing no. 29), is granted and defendant's pretrial motions and briefs shall be filed on or before September 14, 2009. Time between today's date and September 14, 2009, shall be deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirements of the Speedy Trial Act. The trial of this case, currently scheduled for September 14, 2009, is continued and will be re-scheduled upon the resolution of any pretrial motions. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER granting 29 Motion to Continue as to Leonardo Castro (1). Defendant's unopposed motion to continue, (filing no. 29), is granted and defendant's pretrial motions and briefs shall be filed on or before September 14, 2009. The trial of this case, currently scheduled for September 14, 2009, is continued and will be re-scheduled upon the resolution of any pretrial motions. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: Amended MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Leonardo Castro. The plea hearing remains set for the 20th day of October, 2009, at 11:00 a.m. The order is amended to correct the time excluded under the Speedy Trial Act; specifically, the time between the September 14, 2009 pretrial motion deadline and the anticipated plea of guilty is deemed excludable time in any computation of time under the requirements of the Speedy Trial Act. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (CRZ)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: Amended MEMORANDUM AND ORDER as to Leonardo Castro. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (CRZ)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to defendant Leonardo Castro. There are no disputed matters regarding the presentence report and the proper computation of the advisory Guidelines ranges. Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: TENTATIVE FINDINGS OF FACT regarding Presentence Investigation Report as to defendant Leonardo Castro. There are no disputed matters regarding the presentence report and the proper computation of the advisory Guidelines ranges. Except to the extent (if at all) that I have sustained an objection or granted a motion or reserved an issue for later resolution in the preceding paragraph, the parties are herewith notified that my tentative findings are that the presentence report is correct in all respects. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Castro
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to defendant Leonardo Castro (1). Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of eighteen (18) months; supervised release with special conditions for 3 years; $100 special assessment; $1000 restitution. Count II is Dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (4 Certified copies to USM)(JAB)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
